BoomerChallenge.True:
<c=healing>ACCEPT</c>
Both parties agree to race to blowing up 3 <c=midrow>mines</c> first. <c=keyword>The enemy will behave differently and there's consequences for winning or losing.</c>

Follow.name: Follow
Follow.description: This ship copies the opposing ship's <c=action>movement</c>.

Omnipotence.name: Lightspeed
Omnipotence.description: This ship acts every time a card is played.

DuctTape.name: Duct Tape
DuctTape.description: Whenever a ship part would be broken, lose 1 <c=status>duct tape</c> instead. <c=downside>Goes away at the start of the turn.</c>

Left.name: Unsteady (left)
Left.description: When this part is hit, the ship will <c=downside>immediately</c> move <c=keyword>LEFT</c> 1. <c=faint>(Happens before payback.)</c>

Right.name: Unsteady (right)
Right.description: When this part is hit, the ship will <c=downside>immediately</c> move <c=keyword>RIGHT</c> 1. <c=faint>(Happens before payback.)</c>

GoldenEgg.name: GOLDEN EGG
GoldenEgg.description: On pickup, remove all <c=card>Annoyances</c> from your deck, then <c=keyword>upgrade</c> a random card in your deck to a random path.
